item.name: ASM_Policy_Actions
item.description: Requests in this folder are just for viewing and manipulating elements of the ASM Security Policy itself

item.name: Get All ASM Policies
Get ASM Policies - Filter Specific Policy
POST New ASM Policy
Get Policy - Filtered on Policy Name - Stored in variable

request.description: Note: using this request to get MD5Hash to identify a specific policy, then will use this policy ID to perform requests on suggestions/etc.  I have a lot of junk policies on box, that might not have anything so using one I know will have entries.

item.name: Get General Policy Settings
Modify General Policy Settings - Set Policy Block Mode Transparent
Modify General Policy Settings - Set Policy Learning Mode Automatic
Get General Policy Blocking/Learning Settings
Get General Policy Blocking/Learning Settings - v13
DIsable Blocking - Policy Wide
Get Policy Blocking/Learning Settings All HTTP Subviolations

request.description: Note: This request requires MD5Hash to identify the policy (F5_asm_policy_id in Postman environmental variables), and a separate MD5 Hash for the ID of the specific violation.  To automate, would first need to grab the subviolation ID first, then append to URI.

item.name: PATCH - Disable All HTTP Protocol Violations
PATCH - Enable/Learn Specific HTTP Protocol Violation
GET Event Requests
GET Event Requests - Filter request with Violations
GET Event Requests - Filter request with Violations Rating GT 3 and not blocked

url.raw: https://{{big_ip_a_mgmt}}/mgmt/tm/asm/events/requests?$filter=enforcementState/hasViolations eq true and enforcementState/rating gt 3 and enforcementState/isBlocked eq false

query.value: enforcementState/hasViolations eq true and enforcementState/rating gt 3 and enforcementState/isBlocked eq false

request.description: Example of filtering request log to get requests matching only specific criteria

item.description: Requests in this folder are for making LTM policy changes for enabling/disabling ASM, or making policy switches based on policy rules.
